0.text: You need: • a piece of Bristol board in any colour / cardboard / disposable milk powder carton • dried petals and leaves • a pair of scissors • glue • coloured pencils Method: 1. Take the piece of Bristol board, cardboard or carton. 2. Cut it in any shape. 3. Paste the dried flowers and leaves. 4. Colour or draw any design. 5. Write "Get-Well Soon" at the top of the card. 6. Write a message to your friend inside the card.

1.text: Get the students to bring the necessary materials to prepare the card. Give them instructions on how to make the card.
